title: Biography - Elly Schlein
snippet: Elena Schlein, Elly, was born in Lugano (Switzerland) to an Italian mother and an American father.

title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein (Italian: [ˈɛlli ˈʃlain]; born 4 May 1985) is an Italian politician who has been serving as the secretary of the Democratic Party (PD) since 12 March 2023. She is a member of Italy's Chamber of Deputies and was previously the vice president of Emilia-Romagna and ...

title: Elly Schlein Biography: Age, Net Worth, Career - Mabumbe
snippet: Elly Schlein’s early years were steeped in a blend of cultures that would later inform her worldview. Born in Lugano, Switzerland, to an American father of Jewish descent and an Italian mother, she navigated multiple identities from a young age.
